channel.title: macos on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in macos on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Xpc Services On Macos App Using Swift
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before XPC we used to pick up Sockets and Mach Messages (Mach Ports). XPC for communicating processes The XPC mechanism offers an alternative to sockets (or Mach Services using MIG) for IPC.

item.title: Daemons And Services Programming Guide
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: About Daemons and Services Many kinds of tasks that do not require user interaction are most effectively handled by a process that runs in the background.

item.title: Uidynamicanimator
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Definition A dynamic item is any iOS or custom object that conforms to the UIDynamicItem protocol. The UIView and UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes classes implement this protocol in iOS 7 and later.
